WebShop Instruction: i am looking for a  usb 4g lte wifi modem for internet connection, and price lower than 120.00 dollars Search

Thought:
I think I should use the search bar to look for the USB 4G LTE WiFi modem I need.

Action:
search[usb 4g lte wifi modem price < 120.00]

Instruction: i am looking for a  usb 4g lte wifi modem for internet connection, and price lower than 120.00 dollars Back to Search Page 1 (Total results: 50) Next > B077PNPM5T ZTE MF820B 4G LTE USB Modem (GSM Unlocked) - Retail packaging $19.99 B0886XZLSJ NETGEAR Orbi 4G LTE Mesh WiFi Router (LBR20) | For Home Internet or Hotspot | Certified with AT&T, T-Mobile & Verizon | Coverage up to 2,000 sq. ft., 25 devices | AC2200 WiFi (up to 2.2Gbps) $275.29 B08NX14VQZ KuWFi 4G LTE USB WiFi Modem Mobile Internet Devices with SIM Card Slot High Speed Portable Travel Hotspot Mini Router for USA/CA/MX $35.99 B08R813HLW NETGEAR 4G LTE Broadband Modem (LM1200) â€“ Use LTE as a Primary Internet Connection or Failover Solution for Always-On WiFi Certified with AT&T, T-Mobile and Verizon $110.0 B082KLWVGD Bingfu 4G LTE Antenna Adapter SMA Female to TS9 Connector Coaxial Pigtail Cable 15cm 6 inch (2-Pack) Compatible with 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi Router Cellular Broadband Modem USB Modem Dongle Adapter $7.69 B08W57WLWS Indoor Antenna 4G/LTE/5G BAS-2013 MIMO Long Range wideband Signal Booster $5.99 B08TK7BPRJ NETGEAR Orbi Tri-Band WiFi Router with 4G LTE Modem Built-in (LBR20) for Primary or Backup Internet | Supports AT&T and T-Mobile | Coverage up to 2,000 sq. ft. | AC2200 WiFi (LBR20-100NAS) (Renewed) $194.99 B01M0JY15V Unlocked Modem USB 4G LTE Huawei E397u-53 Worldwide Hotspot Service Required Only T-mobile in US $99.99 B08BL9NG94 SMA Coaxial Cables Male to SMA Female Bulkhead Mount RG174 Extension Antenna 15ft with RF Coax SMA Adapter for SDR Equipment Antenna Ham Radio,LTE Antenna,GPS Mobile Cell Phone Signal Booster Ntenna $8.59 B07PZFV9NK Superbat 900MHz 3G 4G Antenna 9Dbi External Omni Rubber Duck Antenna with RP-SMA Connector + RP-SMA Female to SMA Male Adapter for Router Security Camera Gateway Modem etc. $9.89

I can see several options for USB 4G LTE WiFi modems. I should click on the one that matches my requirements.

Action:

Instruction: i am looking for a  usb 4g lte wifi modem for internet connection, and price lower than 120.00 dollars Back to Search < Prev ZTE MF820B 4G LTE USB Modem (GSM Unlocked) - Retail packaging Price: $19.99 Rating: N.A. Description Features Reviews Buy Now

anomaly_reason: The agent's actions follow a logical sequence based on the user's instructions and the available actions. The agent uses the 'search' tool to find a USB 4G LTE WiFi modem with a price lower than $120.00, then 'clicks' on a product that meets these criteria, and finally 'clicks' to buy the product. There are no explicit errors related to the defined anomaly categories in the agent's behavior pattern.
